name: Sun Slayer
description:
First-time entry for Ludum Dare 32 (theme: Unconventional Weapon)

Guide an ambitious young fire hydrant to fulfill her dream of SLAYING THE SUN! The game is straightforward and takes mere minutes to beat. If you get stuck, decipher this message for spoilers: "Chfu gur zbba gbjneqf gur fha ol fubbgvat jngre ng vg"

Controls:

  • Up: thrust
  • Left/Right: steer
  • A: fire
  • Enter: menu
  • Esc: exit
